text: Clifford "Cliff" Williams (born 14 December 1949) is a former British musician. He is best known as a member of the Australian hard rock band AC/DC. He was a member of the band between 1977 and 2016 as their bassist and backing singer. He, along with AC/DC, were added to the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2003. Williams was born in Romford, Essex, England. His wife, Georganne, is from Colorado. They have two children, Erin (born 1985) and Luke (born 1986). ==References== ==Other websites== * Cliff Williams at Ampeg Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:English rock guitarists Category:English rock singers Category:Musicians from Essex Category:Rock and Roll Hall of Fame inductees Category:AC/DC members
title: Cliff Williams
